namespace = civil_war


country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.1"
	title = "regular_revolt.1.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.1.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = YAN }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = south_hebei_area
				province_id = 4194
				province_id = 1816
				province_id = 704
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1816
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = south_hebei_area
						province_id = 4194
						province_id = 1816
						province_id = 704
					}
				}
				add_core = YAN
			}
			release = YAN
			YAN = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				change_primary_culture = chihan
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = confucianism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.1.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.1.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		YAN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.1.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		YAN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = YAN
	}
}


country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.2"
	title = "regular_revolt.2.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.2.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = QIC }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = shandong_area
				area = liaoning_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 690
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = shandong_area
						area = liaoning_area
					}
				}
				add_core = QIC
			}
			release = QIC
			YAN = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = 
				change_primary_culture = shandong_culture
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = 
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.2.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.2.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		QIC = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.2.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		QIC = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = QIC
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.3"
	title = "regular_revolt.3.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.3.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = JIN }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = shanxi_area
				province_id = 2136
				province_id = 692
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 693
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = shanxi_area
						province_id = 2136
						province_id = 692
					}
				}
				add_core = JIN
			}
			release = JIN
			JIN = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				change_primary_culture = shandong_culture
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = confucianism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.3.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.3.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		JIN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.3.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		JIN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = JIN
	}
}


country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.4"
	title = "regular_revolt.4.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.4.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = TNG }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 687
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 687
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 687
					}
				}
				add_core = TNG
			}
			release = TNG
			TNG = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				change_primary_culture = zhongyuan
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = confucianism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.4.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.4.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		TNG = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.4.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		TNG = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = TNG
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.5"
	title = "regular_revolt.5.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.5.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = LNG }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1836
				province_id = 688
				province_id = 2176
				province_id = 2175
				province_id = 2144
				province_id = 2143
				province_id = 2141
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1836
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1836
						province_id = 688
						province_id = 2176
						province_id = 2175
						province_id = 2144
						province_id = 2143
						province_id = 2141
					}
				}
				add_core = LNG
			}
			release = LNG
			LNG = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				change_primary_culture = zhongyuan
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = confucianism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.5.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.5.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		LNG = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.5.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		LNG = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = LNG
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.6"
	title = "regular_revolt.6.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.6.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = MNG }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1838
				province_id = 686
				province_id = 1821
				province_id = 685
				province_id = 2145
				province_id = 2142
				province_id = 4196
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 686
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1838
						province_id = 686
						province_id = 1821
						province_id = 685
						province_id = 2145
						province_id = 2142
						province_id = 4196
					}
				}
				add_core = MNG
			}
			release = MNG
			MNG = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				change_primary_culture = zhongyuan
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = confucianism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.6.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.6.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		MNG = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.6.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		MNG = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = MNG
	}
}


country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.5"
	title = "regular_revolt.5.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.5.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = LNG }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels

				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels

		}
	}

		months = 15

			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1836
		}

				limit = {
					OR = {

						province_id = 2143
						province_id = 2141

				}
				add_core = LNG
			}
			release = LNG

				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				change_primary_culture = zhongyuan
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = confucianism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.5.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.5.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		LNG = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.5.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		LNG = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = LNG

}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.7"
	title = "regular_revolt.7.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.7.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = WUU }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1822
				province_id = 2146
				province_id = 2147
				area = zhejiang_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1822
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1822
						province_id = 2146
						province_id = 2147
						area = zhejiang_area
					}
				}
				add_core = WUU
			}
			release = WUU
			WUU = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				change_primary_culture = zhongyuan
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = confucianism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.7.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.7.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		WUU = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.7.c"

			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}
		WUU = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}

						area = guangxi_area
					}
				}
				add_core = CGS
			}
			release = CGS
			CGS = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				change_primary_culture = zhuang
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = confucianism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.14.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.14.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		CGS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.14.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		CGS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.15"
	title = "regular_revolt.15.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.15.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = CDL }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = yun_gui_borderland_area
				area = yun_gui_area
				area = chuannan_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 664
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = yun_gui_borderland_area
						area = yun_gui_area
						area = chuannan_area
					}
				}
				add_core = CDL
			}
			release = CDL
			CDL = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = confucianism
				change_primary_culture = bai
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.15.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.15.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		CDL = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.15.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		CDL = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = CDL
	}
}

	title = "regular_revolt.22.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.22.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = SMZ }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1012
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1012
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1012
					}
				}
				add_core = SMZ
			}
			release = SMZ
			SMZ = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shinto
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.22.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.22.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		SMZ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.22.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		SMZ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = SMZ
	}
}


country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.23"
	title = "regular_revolt.23.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.23.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = ITO }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 4180
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 4180
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 4180
					}
				}
				add_core = ITO
			}
			release = ITO
			ITO = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shinto
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.23.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.23.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ITO = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.23.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		ITO = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = ITO
	}
}

					}

			}
			release = KKC

				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shinto
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}

			factor = 0
		}

			factor = 1
		}

			}
		}

	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.29.b"

			factor = 1
		}
		KNO = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT

			}

			factor = 0

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.30"
	title = "regular_revolt.30.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.30.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = CSK }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1819
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1819
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1819
					}
				}
				add_core = CSK
			}
			release = CSK
			CSK = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shinto
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.30.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.30.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		CSK = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.30.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		CSK = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = CSK
	}
}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1020
		}
	}

			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {

						province_id = 1020
					}
				}
				add_core = ASK
			}
			release = ASK
			ASK = {

				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shinto

				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.37.a"

			factor = 0
		}

				controlled_by = sunni_rebels

				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels

				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1835
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1835
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1835
					}
				}
				add_core = TKI
			}
			release = TKI
			TKI = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shinto
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.45.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.45.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		TKI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.53"
	title = "regular_revolt.53.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.53.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = DTE }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1026
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1026
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1026
					}
				}
				add_core = DTE
			}
			release = DTE
			DTE = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shinto
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.53.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.53.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		DTE = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.53.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		DTE = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = DTE

				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 4201
				province_id = 4653
				province_id = 2111
				province_id = 2108
				province_id = 2106
				province_id = 4654
				province_id = 2107
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 4201
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 4201
						province_id = 4653
						province_id = 2111
						province_id = 2108
						province_id = 2106
						province_id = 4654
						province_id = 2107
					}
				}
				add_core = MJZ
			}
			release = MJZ
			MJZ = {
				change_government = tribal
				add_government_reform = steppe_horde
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.59.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.59.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		MJZ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		}

			factor = 0
		}

	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = HMI }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 2122
				province_id = 707
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2122
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2122
						province_id = 707
					}
				}
				add_core = HMI
			}
			release = HMI
			HMI = {
				change_government = tribal
				add_government_reform = steppe_horde
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.66.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.66.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		HMI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.66.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		HMI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = HMI
	}
}

			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 709
				province_id = 4676
				province_id = 2191

				province_id = 2193

		months = 15

					OR = {
						province_id = 709

						province_id = 2118
						province_id = 2119
					}
				}
				add_core = OIR
			}
			release = OIR
			OIR = {
				change_government = tribal
				add_government_reform = steppe_horde
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
				NOT = { exists = yes }

		}

			}

	id = "regular_revolt.68"
	title = "regular_revolt.68.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.68.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = SYG }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels

				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels

				controlled_by = reformed_rebels

				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels

				province_id = 706
			}
		}
	}

		months = 15

					}

			}

				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT

				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}

			factor = 0
		}
	}

		name = "regular_revolt.68.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}

		}

			factor = 0
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}

				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = shanshan_area
				area = kashgaria_area
				area = tarim_basin_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2124
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = shanshan_area
						area = kashgaria_area
						area = tarim_basin_area
					}
				}
				add_core = KAS
			}
			release = KAS
			KAS = {
				change_government = tribal
				add_government_reform = steppe_horde
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = tengri_pagan_reformed
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.73.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.73.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		KAS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.73.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		KAS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = KAS

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.81"
	title = "regular_revolt.81.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.81.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = MKS }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = makassar_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 641
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = makassar_area
					}
				}
				add_core = MKS
			}
			release = MKS
			MKS = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = animism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.81.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.81.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		MKS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.81.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		MKS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war

		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.89"
	title = "regular_revolt.89.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.89.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = BLM }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = east_java_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 627
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = east_java_area
					}
				}
				add_core = BLM
			}
			release = BLM
			BLM = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = hinduism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.89.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.89.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		BLM = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.89.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {

				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = johor_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 597
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = johor_area
					}
				}
				add_core = JOH
			}
			release = JOH
			JOH = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.96.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.96.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		JOH = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {

				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels

				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels

			}
		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.104"
	title = "regular_revolt.104.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.104.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = PAH }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 598
				province_id = 4814
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 598
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 598
						province_id = 4814
					}
				}
				add_core = PAH
			}
			release = PAH
			PAH = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.104.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.104.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		PAH = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.104.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		PAH = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = PAH
	}

					}
				}
				add_core = KHM
			}
			release = KHM
			KHM = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = buddhism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.111.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.111.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		KHM = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT

			}
		}

	option = {

			factor = 0
		}

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}

				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = north_laos_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 615
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = north_laos_area
					}
				}
				add_core = LUA
			}
			release = LUA
			LUA = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = buddhism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.119.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.119.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		LUA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

			factor = 0
		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.127"
	title = "regular_revolt.127.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.127.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = HSI }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 2400
				province_id = 4397
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2400
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2400
						province_id = 4397
					}
				}
				add_core = HSI
			}
			release = HSI
			HSI = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = buddhism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.127.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.127.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		HSI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.127.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		HSI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = HSI
	}
}

				}
				add_manpower = 20

			}
		}

				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}

				province_id = 573
			}
		}

						province_id = 573
					}

				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}

			factor = 0

	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = ORI }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = orissa_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 552
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = orissa_area
					}
				}
				add_core = ORI
			}
			release = ORI
			ORI = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = hinduism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.142.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.142.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ORI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.142.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		ORI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = ORI
	}
}

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = YOR }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels

				controlled_by = catholic_rebels

				controlled_by = coptic_rebels

				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels

				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = andhra_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2084
		}
	}

		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = andhra_area
					}
				}
				add_core = YOR
			}
			release = YOR
			YOR = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.143.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.143.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		YOR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.143.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}
		YOR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}

			factor = 0
		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.150"
	title = "regular_revolt.150.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.150.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = BND }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = bundelkhand_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2097
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = bundelkhand_area
					}
				}
				add_core = BND
			}
			release = BND
			BND = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = hinduism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.150.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.150.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		BND = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.150.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		BND = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = BND
	}
}

				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = sindh_area
				area = northern_sindh_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 504
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = sindh_area
						area = northern_sindh_area
					}
				}
				add_core = SND
			}
			release = SND
			SND = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.165.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.165.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		SND = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		}

			factor = 0
		}
		SND = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT

				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}

		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.173"
	title = "regular_revolt.173.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.173.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = KHI }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = merv_area
				area = transcaspia_area
				area = khiva_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 441
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = merv_area
						area = transcaspia_area
						area = khiva_area
					}
				}
				add_core = KHI
			}
			release = KHI
			KHI = {
				change_government = tribal
				add_government_reform = steppe_horde
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.173.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.173.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		KHI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.173.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		KHI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = KHI
	}
}

				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = pirate_coast_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2999
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = pirate_coast_area
					}
				}
				add_core = SHR
			}
			release = SHR
			SHR = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.180.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.180.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		SHR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.180.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}

				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels

				area = mascat_area
			}
		}

	title = "regular_revolt.188.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.188.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = TIM }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = iraq_e_ajam_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 428
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = iraq_e_ajam_area
					}
				}
				add_core = TIM
			}
			release = TIM
			TIM = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.188.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.188.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		TIM = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.188.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		TIM = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = TIM
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.189"
	title = "regular_revolt.189.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.189.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = ISF }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = isfahan_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 429
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = isfahan_area
					}
				}
				add_core = ISF
			}
			release = ISF
			ISF = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.189.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.189.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ISF = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.189.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		ISF = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = ISF
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.190"
	title = "regular_revolt.190.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.190.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = FRS }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = farsistan_area
				area = persian_gulf_coast
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2218
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = farsistan_area
						area = persian_gulf_coast
					}
				}
				add_core = FRS
			}
			release = FRS
			FRS = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.190.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.190.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		FRS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.190.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FRS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = FRS

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.196"
	title = "regular_revolt.196.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.196.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = ANZ }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = tabuk_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 383
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = tabuk_area
					}
				}
				add_core = ANZ
			}
			release = ANZ
			ANZ = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.196.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.196.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ANZ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.196.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		ANZ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = ANZ
	}
}

					}

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}

			}
		}

				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = quelimane_area
				area = central_swahili_coast_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1196
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = quelimane_area
						area = central_swahili_coast_area
					}
				}
				add_core = ZAN
			}
			release = ZAN
			ZAN = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.203.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.203.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ZAN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.203.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		ZAN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
