	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = YAO }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = kanem_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2288
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = kanem_area
					}
				}
				add_core = YAO
			}
			release = YAO
			YAO = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shamanism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.211.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.211.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		YAO = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.211.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		YAO = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = YAO
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.212"
	title = "regular_revolt.212.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.212.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = KBO }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = bornu_area
				area = adamawa_plateau_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1157
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = bornu_area
						area = adamawa_plateau_area
					}
				}
				add_core = KBO
			}
			release = KBO
			KBO = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = 
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.212.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.212.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		KBO = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.212.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		KBO = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = KBO
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.213"
	title = "regular_revolt.213.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.213.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = AIR }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = azbin_area
				area = east_azbin_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2274
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = azbin_area
						area = east_azbin_area
					}
				}
				add_core = AIR
			}
			release = AIR
			AIR = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.213.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.213.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		AIR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.213.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		AIR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = AIR

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.219"
	title = "regular_revolt.219.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.219.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = JPR }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 2048
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2048
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2048
					}
				}
				add_core = JPR
			}
			release = JPR
			JPR = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = hinduism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.219.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.219.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		JPR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.219.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		JPR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = JPR
	}
}

		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 531
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 531
						province_id = 4427
						province_id = 2030
						province_id = 4429
						province_id = 530
						province_id = 2089
					}
				}
				add_core = JAJ
			}
			release = JAJ
			JAJ = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.233.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.233.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		JAJ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.233.c"

			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		JAJ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war

	id = "regular_revolt.234"
	title = "regular_revolt.234.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.234.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = KRK }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1949
				province_id = 4420
				province_id = 2027
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1949
		}
	}

				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1949
						province_id = 4420
						province_id = 2027
					}
				}

			release = KRK

				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = hinduism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.234.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.234.b"

			factor = 1
		}

				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.241"
	title = "regular_revolt.241.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.241.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = MEW }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 520
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 4500
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 520
					}
				}
				add_core = MEW
			}
			release = MEW
			MEW = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.241.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.241.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		MEW = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.241.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		MEW = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.249"
	title = "regular_revolt.249.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.249.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = KOC }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 535
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 535
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 535
					}
				}
				add_core = KOC
			}
			release = KOC
			KOC = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = hinduism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.249.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.249.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		KOC = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.249.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		KOC = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = KOC
	}
}

	immediate = {

					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20

			}
		}

				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 372
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 372
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 372
					}
				}
				add_core = TYR
			}
			release = TYR
			TYR = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.264.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.264.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		TYR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

			factor = 0
		}

	id = "regular_revolt.265"
	title = "regular_revolt.265.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.265.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = TRY }
		NOT = { tag = IRE }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels

				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 4380
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 4380
		}
	}

			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 4380
					}
				}
				add_core = TRY
			}
			release = TRY
			TRY = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.265.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.265.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		TRY = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT

		}

		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		CNN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = CNN
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.272"
	title = "regular_revolt.272.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.272.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = MNS }
		NOT = { tag = IRE }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 375
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 375
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 375
					}
				}
				add_core = MNS
			}
			release = MNS
			MNS = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.272.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.272.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		MNS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.272.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		MNS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = MNS
	}
}

				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels

			}
		}
	}

					}

				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform

				change_religion = catholic

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.273.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

		name = "regular_revolt.273.b"

			factor = 1
		}

				who = ROOT

			}
		}
	}

		}

			factor = 0
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT

		}

				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1792
				province_id = 4027
				province_id = 4030
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1792
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1792
						province_id = 4027
						province_id = 4030
					}
				}
				add_core = MIR

			release = MIR

				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}

		name = "regular_revolt.279.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.279.b"

			factor = 1

		}

		NOT = { tag = BTS }

				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}

	option = {

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.287"
	title = "regular_revolt.287.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.287.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = LND }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 4092
				province_id = 4091
				province_id = 4093
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 4092
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 4092
						province_id = 4091
						province_id = 4093
					}
				}
				add_core = LND
			}
			release = LND
			LND = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shamanism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.287.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.287.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		LND = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.287.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		LND = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = LND
	}
}

				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1170
				province_id = 1168
				province_id = 798
				province_id = 2949
				province_id = 1901
				province_id = 4081
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1170
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1170
						province_id = 1168
						province_id = 798
						province_id = 2949
						province_id = 1901
						province_id = 4081
					}
				}
				add_core = KON
			}
			release = KON
			KON = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shamanism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.294.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.294.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		KON = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		}

			factor = 0
		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.302"
	title = "regular_revolt.302.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.302.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = GLE }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 2776
				province_id = 2777
				province_id = 2781
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2776
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2776
						province_id = 2777
						province_id = 2781
					}
				}
				add_core = GLE
			}
			release = GLE
			GLE = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shamanism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.302.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.302.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		GLE = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.302.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		GLE = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = GLE
	}
}

			}
		}

				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 2798
				province_id = 2797
				province_id = 1225
				province_id = 1222
				province_id = 2799
				province_id = 4033
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2798
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2798
						province_id = 2797
						province_id = 1225
						province_id = 1222
						province_id = 2799
						province_id = 4033
					}
				}
				add_core = ALO
			}
			release = ALO
			ALO = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = coptic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.309.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.309.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ALO = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.309.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		ALO = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}

				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}

	id = "regular_revolt.324"
	title = "regular_revolt.324.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.324.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = HAR }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1211
				province_id = 2773
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1211
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1211
						province_id = 2773
					}
				}
				add_core = HAR
			}
			release = HAR
			HAR = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.324.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.324.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		HAR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.324.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		HAR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = HAR
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.325"
	title = "regular_revolt.325.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.325.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = HDY }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 2760
				province_id = 2761
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2760
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2760
						province_id = 2761
					}
				}
				add_core = HDY
			}
			release = HDY
			HDY = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.325.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.325.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		HDY = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.325.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		HDY = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = HDY
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.326"
	title = "regular_revolt.326.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.326.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = SOA }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1213
				province_id = 2791
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1213
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1213
						province_id = 2791
					}
				}
				add_core = SOA
			}
			release = SOA
			SOA = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.326.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.326.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		SOA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.326.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		SOA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = SOA
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.332"
	title = "regular_revolt.332.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.332.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = TEN }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 2267
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2267
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2267
					}
				}
				add_core = TEN
			}
			release = TEN
			TEN = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.332.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.332.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		TEN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.332.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		TEN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}

				controlled_by = shiite_rebels

				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}

				province_id = 2254
				province_id = 2255
			}
		}
	}

		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2254
		}
	}

				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2254
						province_id = 2255
					}

			release = BON

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}

		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.347"
	title = "regular_revolt.347.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.347.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = KBU }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1114
				province_id = 2238
				province_id = 1117
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1114
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1114
						province_id = 2238
						province_id = 1117
					}
				}
				add_core = KBU
			}
			release = KBU
			KBU = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = shamanism
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.347.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.347.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		KBU = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.347.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		KBU = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = KBU
	}
}

				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 338
				province_id = 2459
				province_id = 2462
				province_id = 2461
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 338
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 338
						province_id = 2459
						province_id = 2462
						province_id = 2461
					}
				}
				add_core = ALG
			}
			release = ALG
			ALG = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.354.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.354.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ALG = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.354.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		ALG = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = ALG
	}

				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1133
				province_id = 2262
				province_id = 1130
				province_id = 2271
				province_id = 2269
				province_id = 2270
				province_id = 2268
				province_id = 1142
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1133
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1133
						province_id = 2262
						province_id = 1130
						province_id = 2271
						province_id = 2269
						province_id = 2270
						province_id = 2268
						province_id = 1142
					}
				}
				add_core = SON
			}
			release = SON
			SON = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.361.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.361.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		SON = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.361.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		SON = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = SON

	id = "regular_revolt.362"
	title = "regular_revolt.362.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.362.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = TRP }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels

				controlled_by = catholic_rebels

				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels

				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels

				controlled_by = coptic_rebels

				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels

				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = tripolitania_area
				area = djerba_area
			}
		}
	}

		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 354
		}
	}

					OR = {
						area = tripolitania_area
						area = djerba_area
					}
				}
				add_core = TRP
			}

				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {

			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.362.b"

			factor = 1
		}

				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}

			factor = 0

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.369"
	title = "regular_revolt.369.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.369.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = NAV }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = basque_country
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 206
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = basque_country
					}
				}
				add_core = NAV
			}
			release = NAV
			NAV = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.369.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.369.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		NAV = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.369.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		NAV = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = kingdom_of_the_isles_area
					}
				}
				add_core = KOI
			}
			release = KOI
			KOI = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.376.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.376.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		KOI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT

			}
		}

			factor = 0

				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = flanders_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 90
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = flanders_area
					}
				}
				add_core = FLA
			}
			release = FLA
			FLA = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.384.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.384.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		FLA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.384.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FLA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = FLA
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.392"
	title = "regular_revolt.392.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.392.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = THU }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = thuringia_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 63
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = thuringia_area
					}
				}
				add_core = THU
			}
			release = THU
			THU = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.392.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.392.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		THU = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.392.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		THU = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = THU
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.400"
	title = "regular_revolt.400.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.400.d"
	picture = FORT_eventPicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = FRA }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = ile_de_france_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 182
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = ile_de_france_area
					}
				}
				add_core = FRA
			}
			release = FRA
			FRA = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.400.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.400.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		FRA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.400.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FRA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT

					}
				}
				add_core = MKL
			}
			release = MKL
			MKL = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.407.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.407.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		MKL = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

		}

			factor = 0
		}

		NOT = { tag = DNZ }

				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}

				area = west_prussia_area
			}
		}
	}

		months = 15

			factor = 0.5

		}
	}

					}

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}

			factor = 0
		}
	}

		name = "regular_revolt.408.b"

				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels

				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = yaroslavl_area
			}
		}
	}

		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 308
		}

					}
				}
				add_core = YAR

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20

			factor = 0
		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.423"
	title = "regular_revolt.423.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.423.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = TRA }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = southern_transylvania_area
				area = transylvania_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1951
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = southern_transylvania_area
						area = transylvania_area
					}
				}
				add_core = TRA
			}
			release = TRA
			TRA = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = orthodox
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.423.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.423.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		TRA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.423.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		TRA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = TRA
	}
}

	id = "regular_revolt.425"
	title = "regular_revolt.425.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.425.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = CRI }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels

				controlled_by = coptic_rebels

				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = azov_area
				area = crimea_area
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 284
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = azov_area
						area = crimea_area
					}
				}
				add_core = CRI
			}
			release = CRI
			CRI = {
				change_government = tribal
				add_government_reform = steppe_horde
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.425.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.425.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		CRI = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.425.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}

	}

					infantry = PREV

		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.438"
	title = "regular_revolt.438.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.438.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = TOU }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = languedoc_area
				province_id = 198
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 200
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = languedoc_area
						province_id = 198
					}
				}
				add_core = TOU
			}
			release = TOU
			TOU = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.438.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.438.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		TOU = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.438.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		TOU = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = TOU

				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = lower_don_area
				province_id = 303
				province_id = 299
				province_id = 302
				province_id = 2415
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 288
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = lower_don_area
						province_id = 303
						province_id = 299
						province_id = 302
						province_id = 2415
					}
				}
				add_core = GOL
			}
			release = GOL
			GOL = {
				change_government = tribal
				add_government_reform = steppe_horde
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.445.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.445.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		GOL = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.445.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		GOL = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = GOL

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.453"
	title = "regular_revolt.453.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.453.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = KAZ }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				area = kazan_area
				area = volga_area
				area = samara_area
				province_id = 2419
				province_id = 304
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2419
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						area = kazan_area
						area = volga_area
						area = samara_area
						province_id = 2419
						province_id = 304
					}
				}
				add_core = KAZ
			}
			release = KAZ
			KAZ = {
				change_government = tribal
				add_government_reform = steppe_horde
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.453.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.453.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		KAZ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}
		KAZ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war

	id = "regular_revolt.460"
	title = "regular_revolt.460.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.460.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = QAS }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1778
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1778
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1778
					}
				}
				add_core = QAS
			}
			release = QAS
			QAS = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = orthodox
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.460.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.460.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		QAS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.460.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		QAS = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = QAS
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.461"
	title = "regular_revolt.461.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.461.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = RYA }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 301
				province_id = 4255
				province_id = 300
				province_id = 2408
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 301
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 301
						province_id = 4255
						province_id = 300
						province_id = 2408
					}
				}
				add_core = RYA
			}
			release = RYA
			RYA = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = orthodox
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.461.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.461.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		RYA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.461.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		RYA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = RYA
	}
}

	id = "regular_revolt.462"
	title = "regular_revolt.462.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.462.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = OKA }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels

				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 4116
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 4116
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 4116
					}
				}
				add_core = OKA
			}
			release = OKA
			OKA = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = orthodox
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.462.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.462.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		OKA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.462.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		OKA = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = OKA
