country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.468"
	title = "regular_revolt.468.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.468.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = TAB }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 426
				province_id = 4341
				province_id = 2214
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 426
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 426
						province_id = 4341
						province_id = 2214
					}
				}
				add_core = TAB
			}
			release = TAB
			TAB = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = sunni
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.468.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.468.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		TAB = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.468.c"

			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT

		}

				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 97
				province_id = 4383
				province_id = 96
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 97
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 97
						province_id = 4383
						province_id = 96
					}
				}
				add_core = HOL
			}
			release = HOL
			HOL = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.475.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.475.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		HOL = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.475.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}
		HOL = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}

	id = "regular_revolt.476"
	title = "regular_revolt.476.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.476.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = CLI }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels

				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {

				province_id = 152
			}
		}
	}

		months = 15

						province_id = 152
					}
				}

			}
			release = CLI

				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.476.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}

		name = "regular_revolt.476.b"

			factor = 1
		}

				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}

				}

				create_general = { tradition = 100 }

		}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.483"
	title = "regular_revolt.483.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.483.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = TRE }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 330
				province_id = 2304
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 330
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 330
						province_id = 2304
					}
				}
				add_core = TRE
			}
			release = TRE
			TRE = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = orthodox
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.483.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.483.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		TRE = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.483.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {

				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 4754
				province_id = 138
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 4754
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 4754
						province_id = 138
					}
				}
				add_core = MON
			}
			release = MON
			MON = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = orthodox
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.490.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.490.b"

			factor = 1
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {

			factor = 0

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.498"
	title = "regular_revolt.498.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.498.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = BAR }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 4766
				province_id = 187
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 4766
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 4766
						province_id = 187
					}
				}
				add_core = BAR
			}
			release = BAR
			BAR = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.498.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.498.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		BAR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.498.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		BAR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = BAR
	}
}

	fire_only_once = no

	MUNgger = {
		NOT = { tag = MUN }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 86
				province_id = 2973
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 86
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 86
						province_id = 2973
					}
				}
				add_core = MUN
			}
			release = MUN
			MUN = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.513.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.513.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		MUN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.513.c"
		MUNgger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		MUN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = MUN
	}
}

		}

				create_general = { tradition = 100 }

		}

			}
		}

					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20

			}
		}
	}

		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.521"
	title = "regular_revolt.521.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.521.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = ARM }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 2204
				province_id = 4303
				province_id = 419
				province_id = 2205
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2204
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2204
						province_id = 4303
						province_id = 419
						province_id = 2205
					}
				}
				add_core = ARM
			}
			release = ARM
			ARM = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = coptic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 2204 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.521.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.521.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ARM = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.521.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		ARM = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = ARM
	}

		TTS = {

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.528"
	title = "regular_revolt.528.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.528.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = NAP }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 121
				province_id = 2983
				province_id = 4734
				province_id = 4733
				province_id = 2985
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 121
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 121
						province_id = 2983
						province_id = 4734
						province_id = 4733
						province_id = 2985
					}
				}
				add_core = NAP
			}
			release = NAP
			NAP = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.528.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.528.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		NAP = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.528.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		NAP = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = NAP
	}
}

				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 2198
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 2198
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 2198
					}
				}
				add_core = AVR
			}
			release = AVR
			AVR = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = orthodox
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20

			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.535.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.535.b"

			factor = 1

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.543"
	title = "regular_revolt.543.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.543.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = NAX }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels

				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 164
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 164
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 164
					}
				}
				add_core = NAX
			}
			release = NAX
			NAX = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = orthodox
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.543.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.543.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		NAX = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.543.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}

			factor = 0
		}

			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.551"
	title = "regular_revolt.551.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.551.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = COR }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1247
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1247
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1247
					}
				}
				add_core = COR
			}
			release = COR
			COR = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.551.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.551.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		COR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.551.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		COR = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war

		}

				}

			}
		}

		}

				}

				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}

				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 199
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 199
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 199
					}
				}
				add_core = AUV
			}
			release = AUV
			AUV = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.566.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.566.b"

			factor = 1
		}

				who = ROOT

			}
		}

				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 51
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 51
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 51
					}
				}
				add_core = ANH
			}
			release = ANH
			ANH = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.574.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.574.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		ANH = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.582"
	title = "regular_revolt.582.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.582.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = SLZ }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 76
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 76
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 76
					}
				}
				add_core = SLZ
			}
			release = SLZ
			SLZ = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.582.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.582.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		SLZ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.582.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		SLZ = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = SLZ
	}
}

country_event = {
	id = "regular_revolt.590"
	title = "regular_revolt.590.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.590.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = FRN }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels
				controlled_by = animist_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = hussite_rebels
				controlled_by = hinduism_rebels
				controlled_by = ibadi_rebels
				controlled_by = jewish_rebels
				controlled_by = protestant_rebels
				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}
			OR = {
				province_id = 1876
			}
		}
	}

	mean_time_to_happen = {
		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 1876
		}
	}

	immediate = {
		hidden_effect = {
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 1876
					}
				}
				add_core = FRN
			}
			release = FRN
			FRN = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}
	
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.590.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.590.b"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 1
		}
		FRN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.590.c"
		trigger = {
			ai = no
		}
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
		FRN = {
			declare_war_with_cb = {
				who = ROOT
				casus_belli = cb_revolt_war
			}
		}
		switch_tag = FRN
	}
}

				province_id = 71
			}
		}
	}

		months = 15
		modifier = {
			factor = 0.5
			owns = 71
		}
	}

			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					OR = {
						province_id = 71
					}
				}
				add_core = ANS
			}
			release = ANS
			ANS = {
				change_government = monarchy
				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform
				adopt_reform_progress = ROOT
				change_religion = catholic
				NOT = { exists = yes }
				every_owned_province = {
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}

		ai_chance = {
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "regular_revolt.597.b"

			factor = 1

		}

	id = "regular_revolt.598"
	title = "regular_revolt.598.t"
	desc = "regular_revolt.598.d"
	picture = FORT_eventpicture
	fire_only_once = no

	trigger = {
		NOT = { tag = NUM }
		any_owned_province = {
			OR = {
				controlled_by = nationalist_rebels
				controlled_by = particularist_rebels
				controlled_by = noble_rebels
				controlled_by = leadered_peasant_rebels
				controlled_by = catholic_rebels
				controlled_by = orthodox_rebels
				controlled_by = buddhism_rebels
				controlled_by = heretic_rebels
				controlled_by = coptic_rebels
				controlled_by = confucianism_rebels
				controlled_by = anglican_rebels

				controlled_by = reformed_rebels
				controlled_by = shinto_rebels
				controlled_by = shiite_rebels
				controlled_by = sunni_rebels
				controlled_by = vijrayana
				controlled_by = sikhism_rebels
			}

			}
		}
	}

					}
				}

				add_government_reform = autocracy_reform

					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
					infantry = PREV
				}
				add_manpower = 20
				create_general = { tradition = 100 }
			}
		}
	}

			factor = 0
		}

			}
		}
